# thecloud_load_balancer_target (Resource)

Load Balancer Target resource allows you to register instances to a load balancer.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `instance_id` (String) The ID of the instance to register.
- `load_balancer_id` (String) The ID of the load balancer.
- `port` (Number) The port on the instance to send traffic to.

### Optional

- `weight` (Number) The weight of this target.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The composite ID of the target (lb_id:instance_id).
